input.sentences: i learned so much in my `` art is everywhere '' class .
even the simplest things | such as this empty lot | can hold beauty and design .
this graffiti is a true piece of art !
if this old car could speak | i bet it would have some pretty interesting stories .
i wish everyone could see the beauty in all the ordinary things they see every day !
output.sentences: I took an art class and what i learned in class was street art.
To practice my simplest art piece, i had to go to an empty lot that will hold all my stories.
A true artist can turn a piece of graffiti into a story.
And those stories will speak loud into peoples hearts and get pretty inspired create their own stories.
Ordinary one day i will teach the beauty of art.
